full_threads.body:
Hi Amy, 

Confirming we have made the below updates : )

A couple of other notes: 

  • Partners page: you can view it here; https://huntleyandco.com.au/professional-styling/ we will link it up to the home page section once there are partners in there. You can add them here or send to us and we can load them in.
  • Google My Business reviews: we added them to the 'About Us' page for you to review. Let us know where else you may like them? 
  • Instagram feed: we increased this to 2 rows as discussed
  • About us photo: we added the 'old' team shot back onto the page

Thank you.




Kind Regards

Amy Smith





AMY SMITH CEO - HUNTLEY + CO

E. amy@huntleyandco.com.au

P. 02 8310 2285 M. 0421 515 854 W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Thanks Amy, 

Confirming we have received this and will work through and let you know if we have any questions.

Hi Heath,
As discussed, please find the copy for the home page and new pages below…please excuse the strange spacing…I have not idea why that’s happened!
HOME PAGE
Furniture + Decor Hire
Property Styling, Photo Shoots, Events
Huntley + Co is a Sydney based hire company catering to stylists, designers, event planners, photographers, developers and DIY stylists.
Styling a property for sale? Staging a photo shoot? Planning an event?
With an in house delivery team, short and long term rental options and an extensive range of stunning furniture, art, rugs, lamps, linen, props and decorative accessories to choose from, Huntley + Co provides a full-service solution for all of your hire needs.
Trade Customers
Are you a Property Stylist or Interior Designer? (in blush or light grey)
If you are looking to hire beautiful products to style a home for sale or curate a space for a photoshoot Huntley + Co is your answer. With a simple to use online booking system and a diverse range, we are here to make hiring a simple and seamless process. Whether you just need a few finishing touches for a room or to style an entire home from scratch, with no minimum order, we have you covered. Sign up for our exclusive trade offers. (“Sign Up” Link to sign up page)

DIY Styling – Home Styling + Event Staging
Would you like to style your own home for sale or a space for an event? (in blush or light grey)
If you are looking for a DIY styling solution then you’ve come to the right place! With no minimum order, you can hire as much or as little as you like. At Huntley + Co you can chose the exact items that will be used for your styling, right down to the artwork and cushions. Choose from our beautiful selection of furniture and accessories that have been carefully and purposely sourced by our experienced stylists. From Luxe to Boho, Scandi to Hamptons, you can curate a classic or contemporary look to suit your brief. (“Find Out More or DIY Styling” Link to DIY Styling page)

Professional Styling
Are you looking for a professional Stylist to style your home for sale? (in blush or light grey)
If you love our product but need a little help with how to put it together, we’ve got you covered. Huntley + Co works with some very talented Stylists throughout Sydney who can curate our products to suit your space. A professional Stylist can help you by carefully selecting pieces that are the right proportions and style for your home and will appeal to the likely demographic of your buyer, which can help to achieve a faster sale and a higher sale price. (“Find Out More or Professional Styling” Link to DIY Styling page)


ADDITIONAL PAGES

DIY Styling Page (linked to from home page but not indexed)
Would you like to style your own home for sale? You’ve come to the right place. With no minimum order, you can hire as much or as little as you like. Whether you just need to update a few items in your home or style the property from scratch, Huntley + Co has you covered.

Stay in control of your styling and chose the exact items that will be used to stage your home for sale, right down to the artwork and cushions. Choose from our beautiful selection of furniture and accessories that have been carefully and purposely sourced by our experienced stylists. From Luxe to Boho, Scandi to Hamptons, you can curate a classic or contemporary look to suit your brief.

Browse our furniture range online or come into our showroom and accessories warehouse where you view and select the stock.

(“Start Your Cart” – link to products page) + “Contact Us” – link to contact us page)

*Please add the “how does it work” diagram that’s on the about us page.

Professional Styling (linked to from Home Page)
Huntley + Co has partnered with some of Sydney’s best property Stylists to help you prepare and style your home for sale. Simply contact a Stylist who works in your area and tell them that you were referred from Huntley + Co.
Heath….how should we lay this page out? The options are:
1. List each stylist with website, logo and contact info and list the areas they work in.
2. List each area i.e. Northern Beaches, then list each stylist with website, logo and contact info below.
I’m leaning towards the first option so that the stylists contact details aren’t repeated. I will send you an excel document in a separate email with their details. I would like to be able to edit the stylist details and add / remove people down the track.
If you would like to become one of our styling partners please contact us to find out more.


I think that is it for now.

Thanks Heath.
Kind Regards
Amy Smith


AMY SMITH
CEO - HUNTLEY + CO <https://huntleyandco.com.au/>
